notwithstanding anything contained in the d.c. regulations 30, 32 & 33,

compensatory area, not exceeding 35% for residential/,
industrial/commercial development, over and above admissible
fsi/bua, by charging a premium at the rate of 50% for residential and
60%for industrial and commercial development of asr (for fsi 1),which
is to be shared between mcgm, state govt.
